title: Machine Learning Research
details: Analyzed feature space with tools such as SVD, PCA and Spectral Clustering. Analyzed quality of the data by calculating variance of the eye-gaze plots clustered by locations weighted by pupil diameter variance. Integrated saccade orientation related features from other research papers.
Created a presentation with ROC curves, Mesh Grids, Cross-Validation charts and Histograms â€“ beginning the process to publish results.
